files.README.md:
# Claude Marketplace

Custom plugin marketplace by Nicolas Bonamy.

## Installation

### Add the marketplace

In Claude Code, run:

```
/plugin marketplace add nbonamy/claude-marketplace
```

### Install a plugin

To install a plugin from this marketplace:

```
/plugin install <plugin-name>@nbonamy
```

For example, to install the crew plugin:

```
/plugin install crew@nbonamy
```

## Available Plugins

### crew

Agent-to-agent async communication via MCP. Enable asynchronous communication between different agents for coordinated multi-agent workflows.

- **Version**: 1.0.0
- **Author**: Nicolas Bonamy
- **Install**: `/plugin install crew@nbonamy`

plugins.name: crew
plugins.description: Agent-to-agent async communication via MCP. Requires the claude-crew server to be installed. See https://github.com/nbonamy/claude-crew for setup instructions.
